servinfo.title: Malfunction Indicator Lamp Remains ON after Engine Starts

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram and Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Malfunction Indicator Lamp Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine Stop (but Engine Can Be Started) .

item.ptxt: Before performed troubleshooting, be sure to read the Precautions of ECM Circuit Inspection .
When measuring circuit voltage, resistance and/or pulse signal at ECM connector, connect the special tool to ECM and/or the ECM connectors referring to Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .

test1.ptxt: Start engine and recheck DTC of ECM and TCM (A/T model) while engine running.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 2 of Engine and Emission Control System Check , Step 2 of A/T System Check .

test1.ptxt: Check CAN communication line circuit between control modules for open, short, high resistance and connections referring to Step 9 to 14 DTC U0073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known good combination meter and recheck. If MIL still remains ON, substitute a known good ECM and recheck.
Repair or replace CAN communication circuit.
